doc:
Michael Sklar https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Sklar 0 Michael Joel Sklar (July 12, 1944 – March 5, 1984) was an American actor, writer and fashion retailer. Sklar died of lymphoma at the New York University Medical Center on March 5, 1984, and was survived by his mother, Bertha Sklar, a sister, Carol Wueste, and a brother, Norman Sklar. Michael_Joel_Sklar ( July_12_,_1944 – March_5_,_1984 ) was an_American_actor_,_writer_and_fashion_retailer .
